name: Jump Journey
description:
Jump Journey is a rogelike 2d side scrolling platformer. Avoid obstacles in this fast-paced game, where the movement never stops. Get gems to unlock upgrades for each run. Play enough runs and you can get permanent upgrades. Each level plays a bit differently, learn to master them all.

Your character never stops moving, and the game doesn't slow down. Avoid or defeat enemies, hop across platforms, and eventually fly your way to the end portal in each level. Earn enough gems to progress to the next level.

Jump Journey has many upgrades you can unlock in each run, such as reduced gravity, orbiting fireballs, lightning defenses, and raining ladders. Earn enough points to unlock all the skins for your character.

Jump Journey will never charge for DLC, microtransactions, loot boxes, etc. All content is earned in-game, and there is no way to give us money to change that!
